}}'''Mysterious Chronicle''' are a series of interactables found inside the Ruin Golem on [[Devantaka Mountain]], [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Sumeru]]. Each one logs the final circumstances of a fallen/missing member of the group of [[Schwanenritter]] knights from [[Khaenri'ah]] who crewed the two Ruin Golems found in [[Sumeru]].

''Note: Each of the Mysterious Chronicles are labeled "Mysterious Chronicle" in-game. The numbers labeled below are for convenience and do not necessarily reflect any actual relative chronological order.''

==Mysterious Chronicle #1==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Mysterious Chronicle:''' "...[[Hildric]], Schwanenritter, 'Beard-Father'..."
:'''Mysterious Chronicle:''' "...Passed away due to multiple-organ failure. May he rest in peace in the foreign land..."
{{Dialogue end}}

==Mysterious Chronicle #2==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Mysterious Chronicle:''' "...[[Hadura]], Schwanenritter, 'Sentinel of the Golden Hall'..."
:'''Mysterious Chronicle:''' "...Executed by the Knight Marshal Anfortas for betrayal that caused irreversible damage to a machine..."
:'''Mysterious Chronicle:''' "...Despite the major loss and that the Knight Marshal's left eye was lost in this event, given Hadura was the last of their compatriots, a proper Knight's funeral was granted for Hadura."
{{Dialogue end}}

==Mysterious Chronicle #3==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Mysterious Chronicle:''' "...[[Ynghildr]], Schwanenritter, 'Damsel of the Dale'..."
:'''Mysterious Chronicle:''' "...Went missing in the battle against the Onslaught of Dark Beasts. Only her ... and signet ring were recovered. A proper knight's funeral was arranged for her..."
{{Dialogue end}}
